name: c01w24-project-rxvalidators
description: ***By: Emily Ho, Lance Talban, Michelle Zhu, Danny Yang, Renat Hossain, Xing Yu Zhou, Kangjie Wu***

setup.win32: cd ./backend/api_gateway && npm install cd ../auth_service && npm install && cd ../user_service && python -m venv env && source env/bin/active && pip install -r requirements.txt && cd ../database_functions && python -m venv env && source env/bin/active && pip install -r requirements.txt && cd ../../frontend && npm install --force
setup.linux: (cd ./backend/api_gateway && npm install); (cd ./backend/auth_service && npm install); (cd ./backend/user_service && python -m venv .venv && pip install -r requirements.txt); (cd ./backend/database_functions && python -m venv .venv && pip install -r requirements.txt); (cd ./frontend && npm install)
